content: small sausage dog knitting pattern by amanda berry email fluffandfuzz@googlemail com website fluffandfuzz@weebly com notes introduction this striped sausage dog is a quick little knit to use up odds and ends of yarn you could make one as a bag charm key charm or just as a sweet little toy work flat this dog is worked flat on single pointed knitting needles but you can easily convert to yarn knitting in the round if you prefer casting on use the long tail cast on unless - this dog is knitted in dk weight yarns double otherwise instructed knitting 8 ply or light worsted weight in less than 5g of brown plus less than a metre each of pull through to cast off cut the yarn leaving at red orange yellow green blue indigo and least a 30cm tail thread the tail onto a darning violet shades needle and sew through the remaining sts on the knitting needle pull the sts off the knitting needle - this dog was knitted in sirdar hayfield bonus onto the yarn gather together tightly and secure dk 100% acrylic dk weight yarn in shades walnut claret fox sunflower olive denim stockinette also known as stocking stitch knit the navy and purple rs row and purl the ws row - any similar dk acrylic yarn is recommended one size 10cm long gauge 6 sts x 8 row for a 2 5cm x 2 5cm square in stockinette stitch on 2 75mm needles don t needles & notions worry about gauge for this pattern it is not critical - a pair of 2 75mm us 2 single pointed knitting needles minimum length 20cm copyright © 2020 amanda berry - a darning or tapestry needle for seaming this free pattern is for personal use only not for resale -
